title: Introducing: Something Scary the Podcast
description:
Do you wanna hear something scary? Join Sapphire every week as she brings you urban legends, folklore, and ghost stories.
Something Scary is a reboot of the popular horror YouTube series that has over 30 million views. This new podcast from Snarled keeps all the thrilling and paranormal stories fans love, but reimagined and expanded for your podcast listening pleasure.
 
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Studio71

content:encoded:
Do you wanna hear something scary? Join Sapphire every week as she brings you urban legends, folklore, and ghost stories.

Something Scary is a reboot of the popular horror YouTube series that has over 30 million views. This new podcast from Snarled keeps all the thrilling and paranormal stories fans love, but reimagined and expanded for your podcast listening pleasure.
